Dialogue.Page: Well, what do you know? For all the genius of Hearthian ingenuity, all that's left of my ship after its unfortunate demise is the chair. The chair. Can you believe that?

It's probably the most flammable thing in the entire ship, and yet somehow I found it floating around out there without so much as a scratch on it. I mean it withstood the reactor blowing up right next to it without so much as a burn. It's ridiculous. And no, Slate, more reactor power does not mean "more better", it just means I don't have a ship anymore. So thanks for that.

I'll have to haul it up to my camp at the top of the dam when I get the chance, but considering that's on the complete opposite side of this thing I figure that'll be a while. For now it'll just sit here ominously to scare the newcomers. Like you. Boo! Gotcha, didn't I?
Hope you're not afraid of ghosts, because this chair is definitely haunted. This whole place is super haunted, but so is this chair. I don't trust it.
